Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers have won five of their last six road games against American League opponents.
The Athletics have lost each of their last six day games against AL Central opponents that held a winning record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oakland does play their best baseball at home and they have played well over the last two months, but I love the Tigers bullpen and think that will be the difference here.
Others: The pick in this article is the opinion of the writer, not a PickDawgz site consensus.
David uses full season statistics, with an emphasis on recent results, to find the best value.
